mapper.select: select substring(#{yearMonth}, 1, 4) as year, substring(#{yearMonth}, 5, 2) as month, count(user_id) as userCount from request_info where substring(create_date, 1, 6) = #{yearMonth}

select substring(#{yearMonth}, 1, 4) as year, substring(#{yearMonth}, 5, 2) as month, #{department} as department, count(ri.user_id) as userCount from request_info ri join users u on ri.user_id = u.user_id where substring(ri.create_date, 1, 6) = #{yearMonth} and u.department = #{department}
